name: Material You & Android 12
description:
The biggest Material You UI Kit

Create designs using more than 1000 components, built to perfectly replicate the real-world, official Material Design Components library for Android.


The latest version of Android

Android 12 is here! This kit provides dozens of components to recreate the system UI for more accurate mockups and prototypes.


✨ Dynamic color

This UI kit was adapted to work with Google's new Material Theme Builder plugin. Easily change the theme of your entire system with just a few clicks!


✨ Auto Layout

All compatible components support Auto Layout, allowing for full customization of padding and spacing. This provides an incredible level of freedom when building your app's theme.


✨ New type styles

The updated text styles in Material3 have been implemented and fully mapped to their corresponding components in the system.


Learn more

This template contains guides to help you get the most of these components and learn about complex features surrounding some of them!
